title: Small town girl
creator_credit: Emma Levy, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Emma Levy leaves the confines of small town life in New Zealand for Melbourne in the hope of connecting with a bigger Jewish community. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Jewish Museum of Australia.
creator_credit_for_label: Emma Levy, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
